portfolio.name: Integrated Manufacturing Projects
portfolio.description: Internal software projects for industrial automation, computer vision, and mobile tooling

projects.name: CERBERUS
projects.full_name: Cummings Electrical Robotic Breaker & Equipment Recognition Unified System
projects.description: An automated system combining robotic arm control, linear gantry positioning, and AI-powered vision to document electrical panels. Uses YOLO object detection and OCR to identify breaker part numbers and phases.
highlights: 6-DOF robotic arm with precise camera positioning
Custom YOLO models for 15+ breaker classes
Multi-model AI pipeline with local/cloud fallback

projects.name: Cummings CV
projects.tagline: Enterprise video analytics for industrial safety
projects.description: A production-grade video analytics platform for industrial monitoring, safety compliance, and visual data capture. Integrates with multi-channel NVR systems supporting 8 simultaneous camera feeds with real-time AI inference.

projects.name: ORION
projects.full_name: Operational Recognition Intelligence and Observation Network
projects.tagline: Multi-camera AI vision platform for safety and analytics
projects.description: An AI-powered vision system for industrial safety monitoring, personnel tracking, and workflow analytics. Features hybrid edge/cloud processing with Raspberry Pi + Hailo AI accelerator for real-time detection.
highlights: Real-time TV dashboard via HDMI output

projects.name: Panel Scanner iOS
projects.tagline: Real-time electrical panel detection on iOS
projects.description: A professional iOS application for electrical contractors featuring on-device ML inference, AR visualization, and smart OCR for panel identification. Exports synchronized video recordings with structured JSON/CSV data.
highlights: 30 FPS on-device inference with Neural Engine
